Project Structure
=================

- `lettings/` – Lettings app: models, views, templates
- `profiles/` – Profiles app: user profiles, views, templates
- `oc_lettings_site/` – Core project: settings, URLs, global views
- `static/` – Static assets (CSS, JS, images)
- `tests/` – Unit and integration tests
- `Dockerfile` – Container build configuration
- `requirements.txt` – Python dependencies
